name: Dust Goblin
description: The Dust Goblin is a small humanoid creature characterized by its stealthy nature and a penchant for ambush tactics. It excels in evading detection thanks to its high Dexterity and Stealth proficiency.
memorable: It can instill fear in its opponents, making it a tricky adversary despite its small size.
goals: To ambush foes and create fear.
relations: Often operates alone or in small groups, potentially alongside other goblins or similar creatures.
environment: Commonly found in areas where they can easily hide and strike from the shadows.
strengths: High Dexterity aids in stealth and ranged attacks, making it effective in surprise engagements.
weaknesses: Low Strength makes it physically weak in melee combat.
attacks: Uses a shortsword for melee attacks or a light crossbow for ranged attacks, both capable of dealing piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Twisted: Causes targets to become frightened if attacked from hiding, disrupting their actions.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in low-light conditions.
skills: Highly proficient in Stealth with a +7 modifier.
additional_information: Immunity to charmed and frightened conditions
Low hit points make it fragile
Good Armor Class allows some resilience
test_queries: small humanoid that ambushes with fear
stealthy creature skilled in surprise attacks
